resources.string: Dallas BBQ is a restaurant style grill, specializing in Western Style Foods such as steaks, ribs, shrimp, fish, burgers, and wings. Prices are relatively high however food portions are large, finishing one plate is an accomplishment. .

McDonald\'s primarily sells hamburgers, cheeseburgers, chicken products, french fries, breakfast items, soft drinks, milkshakes, and desserts. In response to changing consumer tastes, the company has expanded its menu to include salads, fish, wraps, smoothies and fruit. .
An excellent comic store with a large selection. It has comics of all genres and provides good customer service.
GameStop is a video game store selling, video games, video game consoles, controllers, merchandise, and gift cards.
